scripts.css: npm run clean && lessc src/less/app.less > dist/app.css
scripts.js: npm run clean && browserify src/js/app.js > dist/app.js
scripts.cssmin: npm run css && lessc --clean-css='--compatibility=ie8 --advanced' src/less/app.less > dist/app.min.css
scripts.jsmin: npm run js && uglifyjs dist/app.js > dist/app.min.js
scripts.prod: npm run cssmin && npm run jsmin
